welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Vechelde, Germany! Get ready to experience the charm of our quaint town known for its beautiful nature and friendly locals. We hope you enjoy your stay and take some time to explore all that Vechelde has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Braunschweig Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for charter and private flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free wifi network by selecting 'BWE Free Wifi' and accepting the terms and conditions.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Hildesheim Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal mainly used for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Finkenwerder Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
